summary:
Talent Acquisition Specialist / Sr. Recruiter specializing in high volume Entertainment, eCommerce, Technology and Digital Media recruiting. I have over 5 years of corporate, executive and contract recruiting experience in the Entertainment, Interactive/Internet Media, Video Game, Advertising, Technical, Hospitality, Retail, Home Entertainment, E-Commerce and Consumer Products industries. I specialize in Diversity and Inclusion hiring.

I have experience with developing staffing plans, employee relations, succession planning, legal compliance, Recruitment Sourcer, AIRS Training, Unions, employee training & development, diversity awareness, team building, administering performance appraisals, compensation, ADC payroll, worker’s compensation and benefits administration. Proficient in Applicant tracking systems (Jobvite Hire, Breezy HR, Jobscore, Greenhouse, Virtual Edge, iCIMS, Webhire, Taleo, Brassring & Hiresystems), HRIS systems (Oracle 11i & PeopleSoft) and behavioral style interviewing techniques.

Specialties: Staffing expertise: Contingency & Executive Recruiting, Boolean Search Strings, Technical Recruiting, Staffing Manager, Candidate generation/development, Staffing Strategy, Internet Research, Recruiter, Sourcer, AIRS, Data Mining, Human Resources Management, EEOC, OFCCP, contracts, RFP, compliance, staffing, Contract Recruiter, Full Cycle Recruiting, Social & Professional Networking, Web 2.0, Technical Recruiting, Diversity, Corporate Recruiting and Talent Acquisition. SOW Placements, Passive candidate and internet sourcing expertise.

Proficient with G-Suite (Gmail, G-Drive, Sheets, Presentations, Calendar, Drawings, etc), Slack and also Zoom.

I have a dedicated office with access to secure high-speed internet and phone.
